Name: Block_Quotes
Aventura: ['Guests [in Aventura] should expect to be at peace in the middle of all the fun in the city! Walking distance to restaurants, beach and world renowned Aventura Mall. Aventura is clean, safe and fun!', "Exploring the surrounding area, you'll find a golf course, plenty of family restaurants, gourmet supermarkets, and of course the Aventura Mall."]

Name: Lede
Aventura: Aventura's planned paradise of high-rise condos and high-end shopping relaxes a half-hour northwest from downtown Miami. Get your Arnold Palmer to-go and join this lavish waterfront community's retirees and new families for a lazy day of boutique-browsing at the Aventura Mall or opulent yacht-marveling at its local docks. Suburban Miami at its finest, Aventura's easy pace and spotless face promise to pamper.

Name: Intro
Aventura: This coastal suburb promises sleek commercial shopping in metro Miami's northwest.

Name: Photo_Captions
Aventura: ['With the commotion of urban Miami just a half hour away, suburban Aventura is happy to go slower than its big city neighbor.', 'Here, residents sip slowly and linger long.', 'In Aventura, delicately manicured park spaces edge broad avenues.', 'Sleek cars and shiny scooters populate its parking lots.', 'Open roads and open sky call for convertibles.', "Exclusive boutiques and national brands make their homes at Aventura Mall, the area's premier weekend destination.", "It's easy to spend hours at Florida's largest mall.", 'Mall ahoy!', "Placidly situated between luxury apartment buildings and luxury labels, Aventura's harbor remains peaceful.", 'Yachts moor quietly.', 'Calm emanates.', "Lush greenery and paved paths offer simple ways to enjoy Miami's incessant sunshine.", "Aventurans appreciate their neighborhood's open space and slow pace.", 'They stretch their leash.', 'They soak in the sun.', 'Planks for the memories.']
